idea-plugin.name: FMZ Code Assistant
idea-plugin.description:
FMZ Code Assistant

Developer: Chao Zhang

Contact: support@fmz.com

Website: https://www.fmz.com

Plugin Description:

FMZ Code Assistant is a plugin for IntelliJ IDEA, designed specifically for JavaScript and Python developers. This plugin offers powerful autocomplete and file synchronization features, making development work more efficient and convenient.

Features:

  • Code Autocomplete:
    • Provides intelligent code autocomplete for JavaScript and Python files, helping developers write code quickly and reduce input errors.
    • Supports a range of common functions and methods, with an autocomplete list that covers various programming needs.
  • File Synchronization:
    • Automatically detects and synchronizes local files to the FMZ server, supporting .js and .py files.
    • When files contain the specific fmz@token tag, the plugin automatically uploads the file content to the server.
    • Success or failure notifications pop up in the bottom right corner, allowing users to visually understand the file synchronization status.
  • Notification System:
    • Uses the IntelliJ IDEA notification system to display floating alerts when file synchronization is successful or fails, with clear and understandable content.
    • Notifications disappear after displaying for 2 seconds, not disturbing the user's normal development work.

How to Use:

  1. Install and enable the FMZ Code Assistant plugin in IntelliJ IDEA.
  2. Open a JavaScript or Python file, and enjoy the autocomplete feature as you type code.
  3. Add the fmz@token tag in your file, and the plugin will automatically detect and synchronize the file to the FMZ server when you save it.

With the FMZ Code Assistant plugin, you can enhance your coding efficiency and ensure files are synchronized between your local environment and the server. Install and experience it now!
